original_text: Stay there, eating and drinking whatever they give you, for the worker deserves his wages. Do not move around from house to house.
korean_text: 그 집에 유하며 주는 것을 먹고 마시라 일꾼이 그 삯을 받는 것이 마땅하니라 이 집에서 저 집으로 옮기지 말라

sentences.original_text: eating and drinking whatever they give you
for the worker deserves his wages
Do not move around from house to house
